'OD DKAR 'PHRO, ,ZLA BRAL MKHAS PA'I DBANG POR SNYING NAS 'DUD, ,GANG GI ZHAL GYI PADMO LAS 'ONGS PA'I, ,DGE LDAN LEGS BSHAD 'DI KO RMAD DU BYUNG, ,'DI'I DGONGS 'GREL NYI MA'I 'OD ZER GYIS, ,YA RABS CHOS TSUL 'DAB BRGYA CI YANG RGOD, ,ZLA GZUGS GCIG LAS GZUGS BRNYAN RAB 'BYAMS BZHIN, ,DKAR 'JAM SHOG BU JI SNYED MCHIS PA'I NANG, ,DE SNYED 'BYUNG BA'I THABS MKHAS 'PHRUL CHEN DBANG, ,DGE SLONG BZANG
